title: The World of Peter Rabbit and friends
creator_contributor_role: Frederick Warne and Company, production company
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: The delightful drawings and stories of Beatrix Potter are stunningly recreated in this excellent series. From the mischievious Peter Rabbit and his near fatal encounter with Mr. McGregor, to Jemima Puddle-duck and her naive trust in the Fox, these stories will entertain and stimulate young minds.
